movie.title: Copperhead
movie.description_intro: An upstate New York families' clash over their views of the Civil War and the views of the religious towns people comes to a head when Jeff "Tom" Beech volunteers for the Army and word gets back that he is missing. Upon word of his troubles the son of a staunch abolitionist and enemy of the Beech family sets out to find his friend! What happens next will bring a divided community together again.
movie.description_full: An upstate New York families' clash over their views of the Civil War and the views of the religious towns people comes to a head when Jeff "Tom" Beech volunteers for the Army and word gets back that he is missing. Upon word of his troubles the son of a staunch abolitionist and enemy of the Beech family sets out to find his friend! What happens next will bring a divided community together again.

movies.title: The Jungle Book
movies.summary: Abandoned after an accident, baby Mowgli is taken and raised by a family of wolves. As the boy grows older, the wise panther Bagheera realizes he must be returned to his own kind in the nearby man-village. Baloo the bear however thinks differently, taking the young Mowgli under his wing and teaching him that living in the jungle is the best life there is. Bagheera realizes that Mowgli is in danger, particularly from Shere Khan the tiger who hates all people. When Baloo finally comes around, Mowgli runs off into the jungle where he survives a second encounter with Kaa the snake and finally, with Shere Khan. It's the sight of a pretty girl however that gets Mowgli to go to the nearby man-village and stay there.

movies.title: Broken Swords: The Last in Line
movies.title_english: Broken Swords: The Last in Line
movies.title_long: Broken Swords: The Last in Line (2018)
movies.summary: Twelve seasoned men and women are on the run. If anyone can survive this, they will or they will die trying. And many will indeed die before the night bleeds away into morning light.
movies.description_full: Twelve seasoned men and women are on the run. If anyone can survive this, they will or they will die trying. And many will indeed die before the night bleeds away into morning light.
movies.synopsis: Twelve seasoned men and women are on the run. If anyone can survive this, they will or they will die trying. And many will indeed die before the night bleeds away into morning light.

movies.title: Barbie & Kendra Storm Area 51
movies.summary: Get ready as the dynamic duo turn on the TV and get tuned into a viral saga that takes them deep into the world of Area 51. Combining new footage with re-dubbed sci-fi cinema, this is the wackiest coronasploitation comedy yet.
movies.description_full: Get ready as the dynamic duo turn on the TV and get tuned into a viral saga that takes them deep into the world of Area 51. Combining new footage with re-dubbed sci-fi cinema, this is the wackiest coronasploitation comedy yet.

movies.title: Five Easy Pieces
movies.summary: Robert Dupea has given up his promising career as a concert pianist and is now working in oil fields. He lives together with Rayette, who's a waitress in a diner. When Robert hears from his sister that his father isn't well, he drives up to Washington to see him, taking Rayette with him. There he gets confronted with his rich, cultured family that he had left behind.
